content.text:
# 2011 President's Cup (tennis) – Men's singles__disambig_1

Mikhail Kukushkin
| runner =  Sergei Bubka
| score = 6–3, 6–4
}}
Ivan Dodig was the defending champion, but decided not to participate.
2nd seed Mikhail Kukushkin won the title, defeating Sergei Bubka 6–3, 6–4 in the final.
Seeds
Andrey Golubev (semifinals)
#  Mikhail Kukushkin (champion)
#  Dudi Sela (first round)
#  Karol Beck (quarterfinals)
#  Lukáš Lacko (second round)
#  Konstantin Kravchuk (quarterfinals)
#  Arnau Brugués-Davi (quarterfinals)
#  Denis Matsukevich (first round)
}}
